trans-unit.source: Manage pricing and quota for Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Manage pricing and quota for Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Choose the price plan you need
trans-unit.target: Choose the price plan you need

trans-unit.source: Manage pricing and quota for Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Manage pricing and quota for Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Application Insights is in preview.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights is in preview.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Pricing[pricing]</linkText><title></title></link> for <link><linkText>Visual Studio Application Insights[start]</linkText><title></title></link> is based on data volume per application.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Pricing[pricing]</linkText><title></title></link> for <link><linkText>Visual Studio Application Insights[start]</linkText><title></title></link> is based on data volume per application.

trans-unit.source: There's a substantial Free tier in which you get most of the features with some limitations.
trans-unit.target: There's a substantial Free tier in which you get most of the features with some limitations.

trans-unit.source: Each Application Insights resource is charged as a separate service, and contributes to the bill for your subscription to Azure.
trans-unit.target: Each Application Insights resource is charged as a separate service, and contributes to the bill for your subscription to Azure.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>See the pricing scheme[pricing]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>See the pricing scheme[pricing]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Review quota and price plan for your Application Insights resource
trans-unit.target: Review quota and price plan for your Application Insights resource

trans-unit.source: You can open the Quota + Pricing blade from your application resource's Settings.
trans-unit.target: You can open the Quota + Pricing blade from your application resource's Settings.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Choose Settings, Quota + pricing.</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Choose Settings, Quota + pricing.</linkText>

trans-unit.source: How does the quota work?
trans-unit.target: How does the quota work?

trans-unit.source: In each calendar month, your application can send up to a specified quantity of telemetry to Application Insights.
trans-unit.target: In each calendar month, your application can send up to a specified quantity of telemetry to Application Insights.

trans-unit.source: See the <link><linkText>pricing scheme[pricing]</linkText><title></title></link> for the actual numbers.
trans-unit.target: See the <link><linkText>pricing scheme[pricing]</linkText><title></title></link> for the actual numbers.

trans-unit.source: The quota depends on the pricing tier that you have chosen.
trans-unit.target: The quota depends on the pricing tier that you have chosen.

trans-unit.source: The quota is counted from midnight UTC on the first day of each month.
trans-unit.target: The quota is counted from midnight UTC on the first day of each month.

trans-unit.source: The Data points chart shows how much of your quota has been used up this month.
trans-unit.target: The Data points chart shows how much of your quota has been used up this month.

trans-unit.source: The quota is measured in data points. A single data point is a call to one of the Track methods, whether called explicitly in your code, or by one of the standard telemetry modules.
trans-unit.target: The quota is measured in data points. A single data point is a call to one of the Track methods, whether called explicitly in your code, or by one of the standard telemetry modules.

trans-unit.source: Each row you see in diagnostic search is a data point.
trans-unit.target: Each row you see in diagnostic search is a data point.

trans-unit.source: Each measurement of a metric such as a performance counter is a data point.
trans-unit.target: Each measurement of a metric such as a performance counter is a data point.

trans-unit.source: Session data is not counted in the quota.
trans-unit.target: Session data is not counted in the quota.

trans-unit.source: This includes counts of users, sessions, environment and device data.
trans-unit.target: This includes counts of users, sessions, environment and device data.

trans-unit.source: Overage
trans-unit.target: Overage

trans-unit.source: If your application sends more than the monthly quota, you can:
trans-unit.target: If your application sends more than the monthly quota, you can:

trans-unit.source: Pay for additional data.
trans-unit.target: Pay for additional data.

trans-unit.source: See the <link><linkText>pricing scheme[pricing]</linkText><title></title></link> for details.
trans-unit.target: See the <link><linkText>pricing scheme[pricing]</linkText><title></title></link> for details.

trans-unit.source: You can choose this option in advance.
trans-unit.target: You can choose this option in advance.

trans-unit.source: This option isn't available in the Free pricing tier.
trans-unit.target: This option isn't available in the Free pricing tier.

trans-unit.source: Upgrade your pricing tier.
trans-unit.target: Upgrade your pricing tier.

trans-unit.source: Do nothing.
trans-unit.target: Do nothing.

trans-unit.source: Session data will continue to be recorded, but other data will not appear in diagnostic search or in metrics explorer.
trans-unit.target: Session data will continue to be recorded, but other data will not appear in diagnostic search or in metrics explorer.

trans-unit.source: Free Premium trial
trans-unit.target: Free Premium trial

trans-unit.source: When you first create a new Application Insights resource, it starts in the Free tier.
trans-unit.target: When you first create a new Application Insights resource, it starts in the Free tier.

trans-unit.source: At any time, you can switch to the 30 day free Premium trial.
trans-unit.target: At any time, you can switch to the 30 day free Premium trial.

trans-unit.source: This gives you the benefits of the Premium tier.
trans-unit.target: This gives you the benefits of the Premium tier.

trans-unit.source: After 30 days, it will automatically revert to whatever tier you were in before - unless you explicitly choose another tier.
trans-unit.target: After 30 days, it will automatically revert to whatever tier you were in before - unless you explicitly choose another tier.

trans-unit.source: You select the tier you'd like at any time during the trial period, but you'll still get the free trial until the end of the 30-day period.
trans-unit.target: You select the tier you'd like at any time during the trial period, but you'll still get the free trial until the end of the 30-day period.

trans-unit.source: How was my quota used?
trans-unit.target: How was my quota used?

trans-unit.source: The chart at the bottom of the pricing blade shows your application's data point usage, grouped by data point type.
trans-unit.target: The chart at the bottom of the pricing blade shows your application's data point usage, grouped by data point type.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>At the bottom of the pricing blade</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>At the bottom of the pricing blade</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click the chart for more detail, or drag across it for the detail of a time range.
trans-unit.target: Click the chart for more detail, or drag across it for the detail of a time range.

trans-unit.source: Review the bill for your subscription to Azure
trans-unit.target: Review the bill for your subscription to Azure

trans-unit.source: Application Insights charges are added to your Azure bill.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights charges are added to your Azure bill.

trans-unit.source: You can see details of your Azure bill on the Billing section of the Azure portal or in the <link><linkText>Azure Billing Portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: You can see details of your Azure bill on the Billing section of the Azure portal or in the <link><linkText>Azure Billing Portal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>On the side menu, choose Billing.</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>On the side menu, choose Billing.</linkText>
